com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.util

Interface BridgeMembershipListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BridgeMembershipListenerAdapter
    Deprecated. 
    see com.gemstone.gemfire.management.membership.ClientMembershipListener

    public interface BridgeMembershipListener
    A listener whose callback methods are invoked when this process detects connection changes to BridgeServers or bridge clients.
    Since:
    4.2.1
    See Also:
    BridgeMembership.registerBridgeMembershipListener(com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.util.BridgeMembershipListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void memberCrashed(BridgeMembershipEvent event)
      Deprecated. 
      Invoked when a client has unexpectedly disconnected from this process or when this process has unexpectedly disconnected from a BridgeServer.
      void memberJoined(BridgeMembershipEvent event)
      Deprecated. 
      Invoked when a client has connected to this process or when this process has connected to a BridgeServer.
      void memberLeft(BridgeMembershipEvent event)
      Deprecated. 
      Invoked when a client has gracefully disconnected from this process or when this process has gracefully disconnected from a BridgeServer.
